title: Philo Seeks to Shake Up Competitive Streaming Market With New $33 Package That Includes Live TV, HBO Max and More
summary: Core plan subscribers will also get access to Discovery+ and AMC+.

title: Kevin Federline Opens Up About Memoir, Britney Spears’ Parenting Skills: “Joan Crawford on Crack”
summary: "My sons are stuck dealing with a situation that nobody knows how to navigate," the dancer tells The Hollywood Reporter in a wide-ranging interview.
